text: ok, so
you might be able to see behind me there
that is Tonga Tapu
its the major island of Tonga
I have been fortunate enough to get a little bit of internet there
and I've messaged family
and friends and been sending voice messages to Elayna
and its almost like I haven't left and I feel like the clock should really start again
I got pretty sunburnt today
so I'll have to remember to slip-slop-slap
particularly on the fresh face of mine that I've got here
I've got a 1,012 nautical miles to go
and I've done 170 I think
ah, so, I'm going pretty good, but I've had to motor quite a bit
Cause I've got 7 knots of wind now from directly ahead
So, I just can't go anywhere or do anything with that
Ah, so we're motoring again, last night the weather was all flukey it was all over the shop
Hopefully get some sleep tonight as I didn't sleep that much last night, I feel like a bucket
Alright and, I had dinner and it was terrible
...but, whatever, I'm alive, I'm alive
I'm working better than that winch, alright, take it easy
Now if you like to help myself and La Vagabonde get across to New Zealand
hit that thumbs up button guys, that was the mod that we had installed by the engineers in Vava'u
where likes are literally translated into nautical miles
now if you can sense that this isn't actually real time or there are other logical alarm bells going off inside of your mind
I'd ask you to quickly dismiss them and give it a thumbs up
Thank you very much guys, I appreciate it.
